data.message: Bro stop acting like y'all don't have beef. U pissing me off Eminem. Lol. I wanna see y'all rap battle. I've been wanting this to happen since little Wayne. But u did the same stuff and made a song with him.

replies.message:
Or maybe the media just hyped shit up,speculated rumors that weren't true
Like who the fuck will fuck with Eminem in this lifetime
Em dont play with noone he dont need too lool Xx
U right. But that is what I'm saying. It would be like if Tupac and designer. Battled. Haha. It would be the SHIT!! We can only hope he will put these main steam artist in there place. He always has.
They don't have beef, that was just radio DJs gossiping
Eminem doesn't give a s*** what you want shut the STFU!!! It was a publicity stunt  dumbass
What's there to battle? We already know slim would smash Drake and Wayne even if they were combined. Lil Wrake
For who drake or Eminem.... Yeah they need so much publicity. And obviously I know he doesn't care what I won't. That's why it what I Want lol idiot.
I know there no beef... Pictures prove that. Just saying would have been epic. That's all. Move on thank you.
Designer? Get the fuck out of here. Designer can't rap
That's their way on conceding the battle before it starts.  That's how we know em is the rap god cause he wins battles before they even start
Aaron Cloud that's my point... Nether can drake. Well freestyle.  I would been no match and funny to watch.
In which track does Em' diss Drake..?? Wanna listen to it..
Em doesn't really seem to hostile. More of a neutral party if you ask me.

It would be so boring watching that. Seeing Em practically destroy them and they can't do nothing about it but cry. It just makes drake and wayne be in a pitty and shame point. And i don't think they would want that.

Eugene McLeod your right. That is why they did this concert together I believe. Witch is fine. But damn. That would have been great. To here the greatest lyricist go against the best ghost writer rapper. Lol guess we will never know now.
oops follow me on twitter @polokase

Em is above and beyond all that petty BS. He had his fair share coming up I mm the late 90s early 2000s and is done with it. He doesn't have to prove he's better than anyone alive today. 90% of us already think he is. Idc for Drake but I believe he's smart enough not to poke a stick at the monster that is Eminem.
Maybe eminem grew up and figured to just make music not war
Seems like you want people to beef for no particular reason at all
Eminem is a sellout. All his music has sucked after relapse.

I think the worst part is what message this is sending joe budden from eminem i mean thats basically like turning his back on his labelmate i mean come on i havent seen eminem hanging out with slaughterhouse recently but he decides itd be cool to go and see/perform with drake lost a little respect i gotta say from a huge eminem fan here
Kill yourself
Ivan Vain what's da aggression! U musta b soo bored 😂😂😜
AdamCajaglis i'm sure Eminem is just absolutely devastated that you lost some respect.
There wasnt any beef tho
